0.text: Innate: Whenever Twisted Fate kills an enemy, he generates 1 − 6 (based on probability).
0.html: Innate: Whenever Twisted Fate kills an enemy, he generates 1 − 6 (based on probability).

1.text: Since his dice are loaded, Twisted Fate has an increased chance of gaining  6.
1.html: Since his dice are loaded, Twisted Fate has an increased chance of gaining 6.
markedPassages: 6
possibleConcerningAbilities: Since his dice are loaded, Twisted Fate has an increased chance of gaining  6.

0.text: Active: Twisted Fate throws a fan of three cards in a cone in the target direction that each deal magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Twisted Fate throws a fan of three cards in a cone in the target direction that each deal magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Enemies can be damaged only once per pass.
1.html: Enemies can be damaged only once per pass.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Enemies can be damaged only once per pass.

0.text: Active: Twisted Fate cycles through three cards for 6 seconds, hovering each for 0.5 seconds at a time. Pick a Card can be recast within the duration, which selects the current card hovered.
0.html: Active: Twisted Fate cycles through three cards for 6 seconds, hovering each for 0.5 seconds at a time. Pick a Card can be recast within the duration, which selects the current card hovered.

1.text: Recast: Twisted Fate empowers his next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, deal modified magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the card selected, though not being able to  critically strike.
1.html: Recast: Twisted Fate empowers his next basic attack within 6 seconds to have a 0.25-second cast time, deal modified magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the card selected, though not being able to critically strike.
markedPassages: critically strike

2.html: Blue Card Bonus: Restores  mana.
markedPassages: mana

3.text: Red Card Bonus: Deals magic damage to the target and surrounding enemies,  slowing them for 2.5 seconds.
3.html: Red Card Bonus: Deals magic damage to the target and surrounding enemies, slowing them for 2.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

4.text: Gold Card Bonus:  Stuns the target for a duration.
4.html: Gold Card Bonus: Stuns the target for a duration.
markedPassages: Stuns

5.text: Pick a Card's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
5.html: Pick a Card's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
possibleConcerningAbilities: Pick a Card's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

0.text: Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed. His basic attacks generate a stack of Stacked Deck, stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage.
0.html:
Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed. His basic attacks generate a stack of Stacked Deck, stacking up to 3 times.

At 3 stacks, his next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to deal bonus magic damage.
markedPassages: bonus attack speed

0.text: Active: Twisted Fate marks all targetable enemy champions,  revealing them for a duration. Destiny can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration.
0.html: Active: Twisted Fate marks all targetable enemy champions, revealing them for a duration. Destiny can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration.
markedPassages: revealing

1.text: Recast - Gate: Twisted Fate  channels for 1.5 seconds before  blinking to the target location,  destroying all  projectiles targeting him in the process.
1.html: Recast - Gate: Twisted Fate channels for 1.5 seconds before blinking to the target location, destroying all projectiles targeting him in the process.
markedPassages: channels
blinking
destroying
projectiles

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you cannot gain mana, heal for「 45% of this value 」「 0.675 」instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

Keywords

Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+400 health
+400 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: This item gains 20 bonus health, 20 bonus mana, and 4 ability power every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 bonus health, 200 bonus mana, and 40 ability power. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18) and increase all effects of Eternity by 50%.
Unique – Eternity: Restore mana equal to 7% of pre-mitigation damage taken from champions, and heal for an amount equal to 25% of mana spent, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second. For every 200 healing or mana restored this way, gain 35% bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE: This item gains 20 bonus health, 20 bonus mana, and 4 ability power every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 bonus health, 200 bonus mana, and 40 ability power. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18) and increase all effects of Eternity by 50%.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  415

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+75 ability power
+15 ability haste
+8% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 75% base AD (+ 50% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 75% base AD (+ 50% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  550

+7% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.
Unique – Sharpshooter: When fully Energized, your next basic attack deals 120 bonus magic damage on-hit. Energized attacks gain 35% bonus range, capped at 150.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ENERGIZED: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.
